results.name: Alternating row sums of Sheffer triangle A193685 (5-restricted Stirling2 numbers).
formula: a(n) = exp(1) * Sum_{k>=0} (-1)^k * (k + 5)^n / k!. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 20 2019
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 07 2011
